General.Name: Golden Matrix Group Inc
General.Description: Golden Matrix Group, Inc. operates as an B2B and B2C gaming technology company in Central and South America, Europe, and Africa. It develops and licenses gaming platforms; and provides online sports betting and casino, and gaming services. The company is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 3651 Lindell Road, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89103
